name: mrissd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c1)), wcel(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0 ⊆ c1, c3 ∈(Moore ` c1), c0 ∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c1)), wcel(c0, c2)), wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c1)), wcel(c0, c2)), wss(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c1)), wcel(c0, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmri, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c3 ∈(Moore ` c1)∧ c0 ∈ c2)→ c0 ⊆ c1)
⊣ c2 =(mrInd ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cmre, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmri, c3))

comment: An independent set of a Moore system is a subset of the base set. Deduction form. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
